markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Callow May](/Feats.aspx?ID=1324) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are among the most common of changelings—those born to [green hags](/Monsters.aspx?ID=255)—and a vibrant green eye signifies that parentage. Your mother's manipulative nature and versatile voice gives you an edge when deceiving others. You gain the [Charming Liar](/Feats.aspx?ID=766) skill feat. If you roll [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) for initiative, foes in that combat encounter that haven't acted yet are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against you.
name: Callow May

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Callow May Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 31 2.0 --- You are among the most common of changelings—those born to green hags—and a vibrant green eye signifies that parentage. Your mother's manipulative nature and versatile voice gives you an edge when deceiving others. You gain the Charming Liar skill feat. If you roll Deception for initiative, foes in that combat encounter that haven't acted yet are flat-footed against you.
